title: New Release: Bodoni Sans
content:
Bodoni Sans consists of 20 fonts in 3 contrasts for Standard, Display and Text uses.  
Available at [MyFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414234352/http:/myfonts.us/XWTIow)
